# JIRA-MARKDOWN-LINK-COPY

![screen shot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/47078599/389257683-dab9ca9a-bd94-4f37-8359-c8035158e808.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..tk1lKqGvfzzpOc7ef69KowvtQYzTZA7BnLJwYClxAh4)

Tired of copying JIRA issue titles and links twice to link them in your PR? Use jira-markdown-link-copy for one-click markdown link copying in JIRA!

## Thanks

[https://github.com/llagerlof/fresh-chrome-extension](https://github.com/llagerlof/fresh-chrome-extension)
